tr_diplomacy_adopt.zhcn_desc:
消灭敌人最保险的办法就是化敌为友。

§E采纳效果：§!
§Y外交影响力花费§!减少§G50%§!并且§Y迁入导致的人口增长§!增加§G+10%§!。

§E完成效果：§!
采纳全部外交传统将使我们的§Y信任度上限§!增加§G+50§!并且§Y信任度增长§!增加§G+33%§!。
tr_diplomacy_adopt.en_desc:
The surest way to destroy your enemies is to make them your friends.

§EAdoption Effect:§!
§YDiplomatic Influence Cost§! reduced by §G50%§! and §YPop Growth from Immigration§! increased by §G+10%§!.

§EFinisher Effect:§!
Adopting all Diplomacy Traditions will increase our §YTrust Cap§! by §G+50§! and our §YTrust Growth§! by §G+33%§!.
tr_diplomacy_adopt.zhcn_modifier: 外交影响力花费：§G-50%§!\n迁入导致的人口增长：§G+10%§!

tradition_swap.name: tr_adaptability_adopt
tradition_swap.zhcn_desc:
适者生存，优胜劣汰。

§E采纳效果：§!
£pops£§Y人口住房使用§!减少§G10%§!。

§E完成效果：§!
采纳全部适应传统将解锁§Y星球勘探§!决议，能够让我们在我们的行星上执行一次勘探，发现一个额外的资源贮存。
tradition_swap.en_desc:
To adapt is to survive, and surpass.

§EAdoption Effect:§!
£pops£ §YPop Housing Usage§! reduced by §G10%§!.

§EFinisher Effect:§!
Adopting all Adaptability Traditions will unlock the §YPlanetary Prospecting§! decision that allows us to prospect for an additional resource deposit once on our planets.
tradition_swap.trigger_logic:
▲以下条件至少一个满足
▲有有效的国家理念：
▲§H种族洁癖§!
▲§H内圣之道§!
▲§H野蛮掠夺者§!
is_hive_empire§H是§!
is_criminal_syndicate§H是§!

tradition_swap.name: tr_versatility_adopt
tradition_swap.zhcn_desc:
当运行时需要将变幻莫测的星系参数纳入考量时，系统需要一定程度的灵活性。

§E采纳效果：§!
§Y人口组装花费§!减少§G10%§!。

§E完成效果：§!
采纳全部普适传统会让我们在拆除建筑或者区划时得到§G50%§!资源返还。
tradition_swap.en_desc:
A degree of flexibility is required when operating within the parameters of an unpredictable galaxy.

§EAdoption Effect:§!
§YPop Assembly Cost§! reduced by §G10%§!.

§EFinisher Effect:§!
Adopting all Versatility Traditions will give us a §G50%§! refund whenever we demolish a building or a district.

tr_discovery_adopt.zhcn_desc:
是我们对宇宙的好奇引导我们至此，而寰宇之中仍有许多等待我们去发现。

§E采纳效果：§!
§Y异常现象研究速度§!增加§G+20%§!。

§E完成效果：§!
采纳全部探索传统之后，我们的§Y研究速度§!增加§G+10%§!。
tr_discovery_adopt.en_desc:
Our curiosity about the universe is what got us this far, and there is still so much left to discover.

§EAdoption Effect:§!
§YAnomaly Research Speed§! increased by §G+20%§!.

§EFinisher Effect:§!
Adopting all Discovery Traditions increases our §YResearch Speed§! by §G+10%§!.

tradition_swap.name: tr_discovery_adopt_machine
tradition_swap.zhcn_desc:
在宇宙中众多的不确定因素将会影响我们的扩张，若要顺利的在星海中扩展那我们必须要知晓一切。

$tr_discovery_adopt_machine_effect$

$tr_discovery_finish_machine_effect$
tradition_swap.en_desc:
Many of our long range contingency calculations break down due to insufficient data. Therefore, we must know everything.

$tr_discovery_adopt_machine_effect$

$tr_discovery_finish_machine_effect$

tradition_swap.name: tr_discovery_adopt_hive
tradition_swap.zhcn_desc:
在古老的过去，探索者工蜂为我们的蜂群找到了新的巢穴。现在他们抱着与他们的先祖一样的目标航行在星辰间。

$tr_discovery_adopt_hive_effect$

$tr_discovery_finish_hive_effect$
tradition_swap.en_desc:
In our ancient past, explorator drones left the safety of our hive to find sites for new nests. Now they travel the stars, driven by the same ancestral yearning.

$tr_discovery_adopt_hive_effect$

$tr_discovery_finish_hive_effect$

tr_expansion_adopt.zhcn_desc:
只有将我们的文明不断延伸到新的恒星系和星球，我们才能避免灭绝，长盛不衰。

§E采纳效果：§!
§Y殖民地发展速度§!增加§G+25%§!。

§E完成效果：§!
采纳全部扩张传统将允许你在你的所有行星上建造§Y1§!个额外的区划。（这不会作用于环形世界和居住站。）
tr_expansion_adopt.en_desc:
We must expand our civilization to new systems and planets or risk eventual extinction.

§EAdoption Effect:§!
§YColony Development Speed§! increased by §G+25%§!.

§EFinisher Effect:§!
Adopting all Expansion Traditions will allow all your planets to build §Y1§! additional district. (This will not affect Habitats or Ring Worlds.)

tradition_swap.name: tr_expansion_adopt_machine
tradition_swap.zhcn_desc:
增长预测表明，我们很快就会超过母星系的容量上限。我们必须开疆扩土，否则我们将会停摆。

§E采纳效果：§!
§Y殖民地发展速度§!增加§G+25%§!。

$tr_expansion_finish_machine_effect$
tradition_swap.en_desc:
Growth projections indicate we will soon exceed the maximum storage capacity of our home systems. We must expand, or stagnate.

§EAdoption Effect:§!
§YColony Development Speed§! increased by §G+25%§!.

$tr_expansion_finish_machine_effect$

tradition_swap.name: tr_expansion_adopt_hive
tradition_swap.zhcn_desc:
蜂巢只有两种可能的状态：成长，或是死亡。

§E采纳效果：§!
§Y殖民地发展速度§!增加§G+25%§!。

$tr_expansion_finish_machine_effect$
tradition_swap.en_desc:
There are only two possible states for the hive: growth, or death.

§EAdoption Effect:§!
§YColony Development Speed§! increased by §G+25%§!.

$tr_expansion_finish_machine_effect$

tr_harmony_adopt.zhcn_desc:
和谐富足的人民，为了同一个目标努力工作，这样的力量无可匹敌。

§E采纳效果：§!
§Y£pop£人口£food£食物消耗§!减少§G10%§!。

§E完成效果：§!
采纳全部和谐传统将增加我们全部行星的£stability£ §Y稳定度§!§G5%§!.
tr_harmony_adopt.en_desc:
Few things can match the strength of a content populace working towards a common goal.

§EAdoption Effect:§!
§Y£pop£ Pop £food£ Food Consumption§! reduced by §G10%§!.

§EFinisher Effect:§!
Adopting all Harmony Traditions will increase £stability£ §YStability§! on all our planets by §G5%§!.

tradition_swap.name: tr_synchronicity_machine_adopt
tradition_swap.zhcn_desc:
统一的思想带来了一致的目标。我们必须在前进路途中的谋求同步协调。

§E采纳效果：§!
§Y机器人维护费§!减少§G10%§!.

§E完成效果：§!
采纳全部同调传统将会使我们所有行星上的£stability£§Y稳定度§!提升§G5%§!。
tradition_swap.en_desc:
Unity of mind begets unity of purpose. We must strive for synchronized action in all endeavors.

§EAdoption Effect:§!
§YRobot Upkeep§! reduced by §G10%§!.

§EFinisher Effect:§!
Adopting all Synchronicity Traditions increase £stability£ §YStability§! on all our planets by §G5%§!.

tr_harmony_bulwark_of_harmony.zhcn_desc: 当我们处于与另一个帝国的防御性战争中，§Y造舰速度§!将增加§G+33%§!。此外，所有位于国境内的战舰的§Y舰船武器射速§!将增加§G+15%§!

tr_prosperity_adopt.zhcn_desc:
经济是衡量一个国家成败的最佳指标。

§E采纳效果：§!
§Y开采站产出§!增加§G10%§!。

§E完成效果：§!
采纳全部繁荣传统能让我们的行星每§Y50§!£pop£ 人口产生额外§Y1§!£job_merchant£ §Y商人§!岗位。
tr_prosperity_adopt.en_desc:
There is no better indicator of the success or failure of a star nation than the strength of its economy.

§EAdoption Effect:§!
§YMining Station Output§! increased by §G10%§!.

§EFinisher Effect:§!
Adopting all Prosperity Traditions will give our planets §Y1§! £job_merchant£ §YMerchant Job§! per §Y50§! £pop£ Pops.

tradition_swap.name: tr_prosperity_adopt_machine
tradition_swap.zhcn_desc:
只要确保我们的机群能继续存在，个别单位的停止运作就无关紧要。要确保我们的延续，我们必须掌握大量的资源。

§E采纳效果：§!
§Y开采站产出§!增加§G10%§!。

§E完成效果：§!
采纳全部繁荣传统能让我们的行星每§Y20§!£pop£ 人口获得额外§Y1§!£job_coordinator£ §Y协调者岗位§!。
tradition_swap.en_desc:
Individual units all eventually cease functioning. Only numbers can provide the redundancy required to ensure continued existence. To build those numbers, we must have resources.

§EAdoption Effect:§!
§YMining Station Output§! increased by §G10%§!.

§EFinisher Effect:§!
Adopting all Prosperity Traditions will give our planets §Y1§! £job_coordinator£ §YCoordinator Job§! per §Y20§! £pop£ Pops.

tradition_swap.name: tr_prosperity_adopt_hive
tradition_swap.zhcn_desc:
如果我们想要在星辰间传播我们的意志，那我们就必须建设一个繁荣、伟大的蜂巢。

§E采纳效果：§!
§Y开采站产出§!增加§G10%§!。

§E完成效果:§!
采纳全部繁荣传统能让我们的行星每§Y20§!£pop£ 人口产生额外§Y1§!£job_synapse_drone£ §Y突触工蜂 Job§!岗位。
tradition_swap.en_desc:
We must build a strong, prosperous Hive if we are to spread ourselves among the stars.

§EAdoption Effect:§!
§YMining Station Output§! increased by §G10%§!.

§EFinisher Effect:§!
Adopting all Prosperity Traditions will give our planets §Y1§! £job_synapse_drone£ §YSynapse Drone Job§! per §Y20§! £pop£ Pops.

tr_supremacy_adopt.zhcn_desc:
星系的未来属于最强有力的征服者。

§E采纳效果：§!
§Y恒星基地容量§!增加§Y2§!，并且§Y陆军伤害§!增加§G20%§!.

§E完成效果：§!
采纳全部至高传统可以解锁§Y战争学说§!政策。
tr_supremacy_adopt.en_desc:
The future of this galaxy belongs to those who are strong enough to seize it.

§EAdoption Effect:§!
§YStarbase Capacity§! increased by §Y2§! and §YArmy Damage§! increased by §G20%§!.

§EFinisher Effect:§!
Adopting all Supremacy Traditions will unlock the §YWar Doctrines§! Policies.
tr_supremacy_adopt.zhcn_modifier: 恒星基地容量：§G+2§!\n陆军伤害：§G+20%§!

tradition_swap.name: tr_supremacy_adopt_machine
tradition_swap.zhcn_desc:
我们所有的理论模型总是由于其他帝国产生的未知变量而崩溃。既然我们的理论模型已无法进一步改进，那么必须排除多余的未知变量。

§E采纳效果：§!
§Y恒星基地容量§!增加§Y2§!，并且§Y陆军伤害§!增加§G20%§!.

$tr_supremacy_finish_machine_effect$
tradition_swap.en_desc:
All of our theoretical models invariably collapse due to the unknown variables presented by other empires. Since our models cannot be further improved, the unknown variables must be eliminated.

§EAdoption Effect:§!
§YStarbase Capacity§! increased by §Y2§! and §YArmy Damage§! increased by §G20%§!.

$tr_supremacy_finish_machine_effect$

tradition_swap.name: tr_supremacy_adopt_hive
tradition_swap.zhcn_desc:
唯一法则：捕食，或者被捕食。

§Y恒星基地容量§!增加§Y2§!，并且§Y陆军伤害§!增加§G20%§!.

$tr_supremacy_finish_hive_effect$
tradition_swap.en_desc:
The only rule: Eat, or be eaten.

§EAdoption Effect:§!
§YStarbase Capacity§! increased by §Y2§! and §YArmy Damage§! increased by §G20%§!.

$tr_supremacy_finish_hive_effect$
